channel.title: Others Cant Connect
channel.description:
Hey guys I feel like a really BIG NOOB right now but for people to connect to my clien they have to go into Gui.Java ad Client.Java and compile them sleves and all. But i get this error when compiling.
[code]Gui.java:1252: ';' expected public String ownag3pkz.no-ip.org ^ Gui.java:1252: <identifier> expec public String ownag3pkz.no-ip.org ^ Gui.java:1252: <identifier> expec public String ownag3pkz.no-ip.org
3 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Can some one help me with this please.
THANKS!

item.title: Others Cant Connect
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

in gui.java you need this

“serverip.no-ip.org”

narb

Read full topic

item.title: Others Cant Connect
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

you posted the server i.p address in the wrong spot… search “server”, and add it between the two " ", and btw, remove the public string ownag3pkz.no-ip.org

Read full topic

item.description:

Hey guys I feel like a really BIG NOOB right now but for people to connect to my clien they have to go into Gui.Java ad Client.Java and compile them sleves and all. But i get this error when compiling.
